statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, disease_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT MAX(effectiveness_score) AS max_score FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trials FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT trial_id, effectiveness_score FROM clinical_trial_data ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE medication_name = 'Drug A';
SELECT trial_id, disease_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8 ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(effectiveness_score) AS max_score FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE medication_name IN ('Drug B', 'Drug C') AND disease_name LIKE '%Cancer%' ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_trials FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE effectiveness_score >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT medication_name, disease_name FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT trial_id, medication_name, disease_name, trial_date, effectiveness_rating FROM clinical_trials WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM trial_results WHERE duration_in_days > 30;
SELECT trial_id, medication_name, disease_name, trial_date, effectiveness_rating FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT disease_name, trial_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4 ORDER BY trial_date DESC;

SELECT trial_id, medication_name, disease_name FROM clinical_trials JOIN trial_results ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_results.trial_id WHERE trial_results.outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY trial_results.duration_in_days ASC;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) FROM clinical_trials GROUP BY disease_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

SELECT trial_id, medication_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM clinical_trials JOIN trial_results ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_results.trial_id GROUP BY clinical_trials.trial_id, medication_name HAVING patient_count >= 5 ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT medication_name, trial_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 500 ORDER BY trial_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_trials FROM clinical_trials GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY total_trials DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM medications WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Pharma%'
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, medication_name, disease_name, trial_start_date FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT result_id, trial_id, patient_id, outcome, result_date FROM trial_results;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT trial_id, medication_name, trial_start_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE disease_name = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 50;
SELECT m.medication_name, m.manufacturer, tr.outcome FROM medications m JOIN trial_results tr ON m.medication_name = tr.outcome;
SELECT p.patient_name, tr.outcome, tr.result_date FROM patients p JOIN trial_results tr ON p.patient_id = tr.patient_id ORDER BY tr.result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT patient_id, measurement_date, value FROM measurements ORDER BY value;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date FROM trials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT patient_id, measurement_date, value FROM measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
